entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -13.5°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming east 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:26 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:26 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening and risk of freezing rain. Clearing late in the evening. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 overnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:26 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
